column1: Wishing everyone a safe and happy Thanksgiving https://t.co/fr0V7uOAel

Saturday marked the 25th anniversary of the Dayton Peace Accords. To commemorate this I donated testimonies of the Bosnian people to @PeaceMuseumOhio earlier this year. Read more via @WDTN:  https://t.co/p8MgkYLANb
Read more here: https://t.co/uMpfQXfcfw

I will be working in the conference process to maintain steady funding for @WrightPattAFB modernize our nuclear arsenal improve diversity in the Armed Services & Armed Service Academies ensure safe water around military installations & combat sexual assault in the military.
I am proud to join my fellow lawmakers in a bipartisan & bicameral effort to create the final version of #FY21NDAA.
From 4-6pm today @PublicHealthDMC will be handing out free surgical masks & hand sanitizer⬇ https://t.co/ew0q1HWBsq
Good luck to Dayton Flyer @obitoppin1 in tonight's @NBA draft! #OH10 is rooting for you🏀 https://t.co/LYeAR2s1xm
.@cityofdayton is providing free masks at Kettering Field this week. https://t.co/u8BOIlyb2o
Read more via @daytondailynews's @ThomasGnau: https://t.co/NJfJsALzYK

This announcement shows @SpaceForceDoD's understanding of the importance of NASIC’s work & bodes well for future partnership between @WrightPattAFB NASIC & Space Force. As Space Force continues to be stood up I will keep advocating to bring its missions to our community.
I have been working with top leadership of @DeptofDefense @usairforce & @SpaceForceDoD to ensure NASIC continues its critical work in space intelligence.
#SmallBiz help is available in #OH. Visit https://t.co/WtuSOF2dGc for more info https://t.co/tQWNilvm3b
Experiencing a power outage due to #SevereWeather in #OH10? Report it by calling 877-4OUTAGE or clicking here: https://t.co/mFQq4jMkzL https://t.co/0IF0UmCmyE
Helpful info via @OHdeptofhealth on best practices for mask wearing⬇️ https://t.co/PLBqfghDdO
#COVID19 cases continue to rise throughout the US & in #OH. Please wash your hands wear a mask and social distance. https://t.co/kLbq8w6kyS
#COVID19 testing for kids is available via @DaytonChildrens. Learn more below. https://t.co/yKa9mhV3F5
On this #VeteransDay I proudly honor each man & woman who has sacrificed to fight for our freedom. Thank you all for your service. https://t.co/zUweW1G1IJ
.@PublicHealthDMC is providing free walk up #COVID19 testing today @ the Montgomery County Fairgrounds until 5pm. https://t.co/PNZZ9XNzNt
245 years of incredible service to our country. Thank you @USMC #SemperFi https://t.co/tet0vK22EL
.@EsperDoD was an outstanding Secretary of Defense. His leadership had the support of our military and the American people.
#CARESact continues to assist people struggling to make ends meet. For help go to https://t.co/xiboBwTp8I and apply before 11/13. https://t.co/0OnAY4bNWa
Yesterday at @WrightPattAFB I helped break ground on the new building for NASIC which I helped secure the funding of. Watch via @dayton247now's @Chelsea247now: https://t.co/i9nPaRHfiK

NASIC's reputation of excellence caused the @DeptofDefense & Congress to look to @WrightPattAFB  to invest dollars to make sure they have the latest tools the best equipment & the best facilities to continue their work.   Read more about this major investment I helped secure: https://t.co/qZLk3MOHyE
All of #OH10 is on Red Alert for #COVID19. Please wear masks social distance and wash your hands. https://t.co/dwfcXJ0ssU
#CARESact continues to help keep #OH10's #SmallBiz afloat during #COVID19. Read via @daytondailynews's @CFrolik about which businesses are getting relief: https://t.co/eutNiVA2d0
.@OhioDevelopment is providing assistance for Ohioans struggling to pay their utility bills. Find out more information and apply for the program here: https://t.co/k5s2GwgcoD
$5B is coming to Ohio's businesses to assist in #COVID19. Learn more via @WDTN's @morse_caroline: https://t.co/KEV5ALKgRG
Today I visited with @wilberforce_u President Dr. Pinkard to discuss current issues & future goals for the first private #HBCU located right here in #OH10 https://t.co/FCRSnXm2eW

.@POTUS is doing now what @POTUS44 & @VP44 should have done then: demanding a resolution for the Delphi Salaried Retirees' pensions. Read my #OpEd with Peter Navarro in @thehill: https://t.co/k7losP45hb
#HappyHalloween! If you are participating in #TrickOrTreat tonight please stay safe by following these guidelines as provided by @PublicHealthDMC https://t.co/TrAL1An1Kc
Great video by Dayton company @realart on the importance of staying safe in #COVID19. https://t.co/clSx86nhwo
.@cityofdayton is holding a drive-thru #TrickOrTreat from 5:30-7:30pm tomorrow at Kettering Field #HappyHalloween https://t.co/FTTYGhWPvU

Yesterday I joined @daytonregion's Ohio Space Forum. Space is not uncharted territory for #OH. Our history is rich in aviation aerospace & in support of the nation's most vital space missions. Learn more via @whiotv's @KatyAndNews: https://t.co/W57y6KOIP6

I look forward to the Request For Information (RFI) release later this year initiating the process. I will continue to collaborate with our community & @usairforce to ensure this development has a meaningful impact for the local economy and our national security.
As a result of this advocacy we are grateful for @usairforce's announcement it will undertake the process to use an EUL as the mechanism to lease its land for commercial development.
Our collaboration resulted in a proposal that @usairforce leaders consider using an EUL to develop land owned by the installation.
Last year I worked with @daytonregion & @WrightPattAFB leadership to find opportunities for development growth & job creation on and around the Base.

This morning I visited Trifecta Tool & Engineering in Kettering. Amidst the #COVID pandemic Trifecta has used their manufacturing operations to start producing #PPE materials such as protective visor parts. Thank you to the Trifecta Team for keeping us safe. https://t.co/W0sxSmY8NL
If you need food assistance this holiday season @KrocDayton is providing help. https://t.co/Hdt1WLqn5u
All of #OH10 is currently considered high incidence. Please continue to wear your masks social distance and wash your hands. https://t.co/OvTOCN01f9

If you live in Montgomery County & need assistance due to  #COVID19 be sure to apply for it by the following deadlines:  Oct 30: Mortgage Assistance Nonprofit #SmallBiz Education Agriculture Childcare Healthcare  Nov 13: Rental Assistance DP&L/Vectren  https://t.co/QLPe9c9nfN https://t.co/lWJc3t4iaQ

The Delphi Salaried Retirees earned their pensions. Last week @POTUS took action to give these retirees hope of getting their pensions restored after the Obama-Biden Administration left them out in the cold. Learn more via my interview with @BreitbartNews: https://t.co/NgUrjaLBnZ

Delphi Salaried Retirees lost their health care & their pensions under the Obama-Biden Administration.  Yesterday @POTUS gave the Delphi Salaried Retirees hope for the first time in 11 years. Watch via @dayton247now's @Bryn247NOW: https://t.co/oLJrhHZIyw
Learn more about @POTUS's help for Delphi Salaried Retirees via @whiotv's @SCudahyWHIO: https://t.co/Px0gMCjoeJ
Thank you @POTUS! I have been fighting for the Delphi Salaried Retirees for 11 years and today they were finally given hope thanks to you. https://t.co/FEaCm1AikJ

For 11 long years I have been at the forefront of helping the Delphi Salaried Retirees fight to retain their pensions which they earned through years of faithful service. @POTUS is proving yet again that he supports American workers. Read more here: https://t.co/rGmp3d7562

🚨🚨🚨MAJOR NEWS: @POTUS just signed a Presidential Memorandum to help Delphi Salaried Retirees.  Today President Trump is taking action to finally help these hard working people who were robbed by the Obama-Biden Administration.
I will continue to advocate for these Retirees as I have since 2009 when the Obama-Biden Administration wrongly took the pensions they had worked for and earned.

.@POTUS understands that the Obama-Biden Administration unjustly terminated these pensions. He is  considering intervening on behalf of the Retirees’ in this over decade-long fight. https://t.co/TB2cuzxVhb

This much needed expansion will help serve not only our community but also our national security as the work done at NASIC is critical to our intelligence operations. I am pleased to see this expansion moving ahead & I look forward to the official groundbreaking on this project
Bringing $182M to create the largest expansion project in @WrightPattAFB's history is one of my greatest achievements as a Member of Congress. https://t.co/JMD6hGldbp

Thank you to the staff at Modern Technologies Solutions Inc. in Beavercreek for welcoming me today! MTSI employees provided me with a demonstration of their new tech products and I was able to learn about their contributions to national defense aviation tech and engineering. https://t.co/sRXNsVDfO4

Today I took another step to support and assist #SmallBiz in our community during #COVID19. PPP loans provided to date over $820 million across 7300 small businesses in #OH10. It is imperative the House votes on an extension of the PPP program. https://t.co/9UVqeLegP4
Today I led 14 Members of Congress in urging @POTUS to restore Delphi Salaried Retirees' pensions. Read more here: https://t.co/PlbKDrPmWE

.@PeterNavarro45 told @21WFMJNews yesterday that the Delphi Salaried Retirees have @POTUS's attention. Hear more about President Trump's possible intervention in the retirees' fight for their pensions: https://t.co/DtL82KkFVs
I will continue to advocate for these Retirees as I have since 2009 when the Obama Administration wrongly took the pensions they had worked for and earned. Read more here: https://t.co/Vsfe07SCmz

This week I again spoke to @POTUS about the Delphi Salaried Retirees’ fight for their pensions. President Trump understands the Obama Administration unjustly terminated these pensions. He is now considering intervening on behalf of the Retirees’ in this over decade-long fight.

First Baptist Church of Ridgewood Heights has much to be proud of today: their centennial anniversary and the payment of their second mortgage. I am lucky to have been able to celebrate with them this morning. Congratulations on 100 years and thank you for all that you do! https://t.co/KuRkfAyNxC

As a Member of Congress I was able to meet Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg several times. She was a warm and kind spirit who had a deep interest in people and love for this country. Her legacy on this Court will be long remembered.

Happy Birthday to @usairforce. Each time I visit @WrightPattAFB I am impressed by the character and work-ethic of the men and women in the Air Force. Thank you to all airmen past and present for 73 years of service. https://t.co/wrDMvMEunI
https://t.co/DVIVMxap5n
.@fuyaousa has 350 job openings right now in #OH10. Learn more via @whiotv's @MCastroWHIO: https://t.co/Nbmfxdj7oH
We will #NeverForget the lives lost on September 11th. https://t.co/cqEd63jk5A

I was Mayor of Dayton when the Dayton Peace Accords were agreed to 25 years ago. I was proud to donate testimonies from those who lived through the siege in Bosnia to @PeaceMuseumOhio. Learn more about the artifacts I donated via @WDTN: https://t.co/p8MgkYLANb

Yesterday I joined @RepAGonzalez in asking @POTUS to give at least 5M #COVID19 tests to #OH to help us continue to respond to the pandemic. Read more here: https://t.co/7Yfx0utlKQ https://t.co/Xz1GlqgvEi

Today I brought @RepBradWenstrup to #OH10 to tour the revitalization of downtown Dayton. Brad sits on @WaysandMeansGOP & works on funding projects like the Dayton Arcade. Learn more via @WDTN’s @aliahonair: https://t.co/aB5oHP6sBm

I would like to congratulate @DCDCLive CEO Ro Nita Hawes-Saunders for being the first ever recipient of the DBJ Jane Haley Award for Determination Perseverance and Achievement. Ms. Hawes-Saunder’s efforts have made Dayton a better place and she is most deserving of this award.

Yesterday I hosted a roundtable to hear from #SmallBiz owners in #OH10 who received #PPP loans from #CARESact. Thank you to @HSBCgop Ranking Member @RepSteveChabot for participating. https://t.co/7JgmNLLsZj

We must achieve diversity within the ranks of our military and these provisions are strong steps towards achieving that goal. I will continue to advocate for the inclusion of this bill throughout the conference process of the NDAA. https://t.co/hsTS6clZ23

I am proud to work across the aisle with @RepAnthonyBrown on this issue & I am pleased we were able to include these provisions in the House-passed #FY21NDAA. It is critical that the forces that protect our nation also reflect the diversity of our country.

I joined @RepAnthonyBrown in introducing #DiversityInDefenseAct. Our armed forces are some of the most respected institutions in our nation and should lead by example and encourage increased diversity in their ranks.
To read more about the bill plus how it helps @CentralState87 @SinclairCC & @wilberforce_u in #OH10 click here: https://t.co/Sb14yf1yDy
It is critical @CFPB investigates allegations of educational redlining. I will continue to support our HBCU & community college students by challenging discriminations such as this.

I am proud to be the first Republican to support @RepMarciaFudge's Examining Educational Redlining in Lending Act. Under no circumstances should someone’s borrowing rate be higher because they attend a school that primarily serves minorities.

Congrats to @cityofdayton & @BeavercreekOHCH on being ranked #33 in the country for operating a startup. As I said last week @WrightPattAFB's 10K+ job growth since I have been in Congress has helped insulate #OH10's economy from what could have been greater job loss in #COVID19. https://t.co/iH1mmD2MDg

Last week I wrote to @BWallaceMP urging the UK to join the US in extending the arms embargo on Iran that @UN Security Council declined to extent. You can read the full letter by clicking here: https://t.co/sjaSaw6bDH https://t.co/b6pjl7JfnH

.@WrightPattAFB's growth of over 10K jobs since I have been in Congress has helped insulate #OH10's economy from what could have been much greater job loss during #COVID19. Read more via @DBJnews: https://t.co/syqXuFcuYh
https://t.co/zmSJTs7DCl

This critical funding for @svdpusacouncil & @voaohin will help our veterans access the stable housing & skills for success that they have more than earned. Our veterans sacrifice so much for us & I am proud nearly $4M is coming to our community to give back to them.
I have strongly supported our veterans in #OH10 & I am proud to announce today that nearly $4M is coming to organizations in our community to combat veteran homelessness.
I will continue to advocate for @DaytonChildrens & our community as we navigate this ongoing pandemic. Read more here: https://t.co/Oh9nrF47wR

After my communications with the Administration in support of additional funding for children’s hospitals I am proud to announce that #OH will be receiving $165M in #COVID19 relief funds for children’s hospitals.
When I visited @DaytonChildrens last week & met with CEO Deb Feldman it was clear how much work their team has put into combating #COVID19 & keeping their patients healthy. https://t.co/rLx6HXiqjZ

Today is #NationalAviationDay! Home to the Wright Brothers & @WrightPattAFB #OH10 is the home of aviation. I have a replica of the Wright Flyer in my DC office as a constant reminder of our community’s past & present dedication to flight✈️ https://t.co/7DJJdEmh5c
Read my full letter to @USPS here: https://t.co/DagwCJtq48

It is important that the Postmaster General & @USPS respond to the challenges caused by #COVID19 in order to protect our right to vote. That is why I am urging USPS to prepare for the increased amount of mail in ballots that will likely be sent this election season.

On Friday I wrote to the Postmaster General requesting @USPS coordinate with the State of Ohio to prepare for an increase of absentee & mail-in ballots resulting from #COVID19. Voting is a cornerstone of democracy.

@GDRTA provides a critical service to the Dayton area. They have adapted to the uncertainty of the pandemic by ramping up nightly bus sanitation and developing touch-free access that begins next month. I was proud to join them today to view their new eco-smart fleet. https://t.co/P7kiEz45pi

Today I had the to opportunity to meet the new @CentralState87 president Dr. Jack Thomas. We discussed federal funding for CSU and the recent resolution I co-sponsored that formally recognizes the 130th anniversary of the 19 historically black land-grant universities. https://t.co/Ns1DYtSCk5

This morning I visited @DaytonChildrens and met with President and CEO Deb Feldman. The hospital and its employees have put in tremendous work to make Dayton Children’s Hospital a major #COVID19 testing site for the state of Ohio. https://t.co/iMCwmIa978

I am saddened to hear about the passing of former National Security Advisor Brent Scowcroft. Brent was a leading example of what it meant to be a public servant and he cared deeply about the safety of all Americans. His loved ones are in my thoughts at this time.
My full statement on the 12 year anniversary of Russia invading Georgia https://t.co/Ix0ZNw6Q0D https://t.co/bbe7pAX5DE
This morning I toured the proposed West Dayton/Wright Dunbar Gateway Project with developer John Lumpkin. https://t.co/92qDaAVJRx

That is why @RepAnthonyBrown & I have invited the Superintendents of the service academies to brief a group of Members of the Armed Services Committee to ensure that that concrete steps are being taken to address this vital issue. Read more here: https://t.co/pwdm4s6Rei
As the incubators of the future leaders of our military the service academies must initiate the change necessary to eliminate racism in their ranks & build diverse teams.

This week @RepAnthonyBrown & I sent letters to the Superintendents of service academies regarding actions each academy has taken to address racism within their ranks. The Armed Services & their respective service academies are some of the most respected institutions in America.

I visited @peacemuseumohio today to commemorate the 1 year anniversary of the Dayton shooting & present a Congressional Record of my speech on the House Floor honoring the victims & thanking @DaytonPolice for their heroic response. https://t.co/AnQ5nYbU4w
One year ago a gunman opened fire on a crowded street in the Oregon District in Dayton. Last week I went to the House Floor to honor the victims and thank @DaytonPolice. https://t.co/aExnbO5SfH

I will continue to advocate for historically black universities’ programs and students. Read more about the bill I've cosponsored recognizing @CentralState87's 130th anniversary here: https://t.co/RBsAwrZ9ER

.@CentralState87 is a hub for education research & innovation in our community & I am proud to recognize its 130th anniversary. I have successfully fought to increase CSU’s access to federal funding as an 1890 Land Grant Institution.

Year after year far leftist liberal progressives attempt to cut the defense spending budget. This year they have begun to deceptively use #COVID19 as an excuse to slash spending for our national security. Read my opinion in @thehill: https://t.co/xfzflYfNnn
Congratulations Stacy on your 17th year on Capitol Hill!!  When you joined my office you made history as being the first female African American Rep. Chief of Staff. https://t.co/2mFtJEmTnv
I am glad to support Judge Newman’s confirmation as a US District Judge for the Southern District of Ohio. https://t.co/9Dcz0wuXsD

From his work on veterans’ courts to his leadership in the Federal Bar Association to his previous experience as a public servant it is clear he is prepared to serve the citizens seen before the US District Court.
For many years Judge Newman has been a proud example of fairness in our community’s justice system. https://t.co/fUYWW1aehD

National historical parks in Dayton play an important role in educating & celebrating our aviation history. Maintaining @visit_NAHA sites is something I am proud to advocate for. I will continue to show my support for Dayton’s national parks & sites. https://t.co/ZphapeKBW2
I am eager to see the results of the evaluation phase and will continue to advocate for @WrightPattAFB in my continued conversations with Gen. Raymond. Read more here: https://t.co/dIO32KL327

The advancement of @WrightPattAFB in the selection process for hosting @US_SpaceCom is an important step forward that I have advocated strongly for. As the home of invention of flight and a pioneer in space travel and defense WPAFB has the foundation to host US Space Command.
This bill provides court oversight to ensure everyone has equal access to voting and it should be moved to @POTUS's desk without delay. Read more here: https://t.co/PkxuPIYrGF

.@repjohnlewis bravely fought for all Americans to have an equal opportunity to vote. To honor his legacy @JimPressOffice & I are calling on the Senate to consider the Voting Rights Amendment Act the only bipartisan solution to restore the historical Voting Rights Act.

Congrats to those who noticed our recognition of the @USNavy on our recent mailer. Part of our 10K+ job growth at @WrightPattAFB includes the Naval Aerospace Medical Research Lab won in BRAC which operates the Kraken. Tip of the wing to the eagle eyes that noticed.
Congress should be immediately briefed on Russia’s latest weapons test by Gen. Raymond Commander of @US_SpaceCom.

I strongly condemn Russia’s space-based anti-satellite weapons test the latest in our adversaries’ aggressive behavior against the United States & our allies. This test by Russia is not occurring on land sea air or cyberspace but in a new warfighting domain: space. https://t.co/iYZ5cRyPvk

Tonight I joined my colleagues on the House Floor to honor @repjohnlewis's life and legacy. I am calling on Congress to pass & send to @POTUS's desk for signature the bipartisan Voting Rights Amendment Act. https://t.co/Hbf8Q9GE2u

- improving military housing - preventing sexual assault in the military protecting victims of sexual assault & prosecuting sexual offenders.   I will continue to fight for these issues through the conference process.  For more details click here: https://t.co/NbRg9ILcod

- $58.5 million in funding for military construction projects at @WrightPattAFB - modernizing the nuclear triad - limiting @LigadoNetworks' ability to cause harm to @DeptofDefense's GPS systems - addressing PFAS - advancing diversity and equality within our servicemembers’ ranks

#FY21NDAA just overwhelmingly passed the House. I am proud that we were able to come together to create a strong bipartisan bill to support our troops & provide necessary funding to keep our country safe. A quick thread of major wins I was able to include in this bill:

Today I spoke on the House Floor in support of #FY21NDAA. This bipartisan bill: ✅provides support to the people who defend our country ✅includes remarkable strides to protect military sexual assault victims ✅advances diversity & equality in our servicemembers' ranks https://t.co/kbiRjPgtTb
.@PublicHealthDMC is providing free #COVID19 testing at the Montgomery County Fairgrounds today until 4pm. More info here: https://t.co/YyrWom7Vp5

I am glad @DeptVetAffairs has decided to extend this much-needed financial relief through the end of the year for veterans & their families so they can focus on their health and wellbeing during the coronavirus pandemic. Learn more here⬇️ https://t.co/QZvgDhlDN8

I join my colleagues & the nation in mourning the loss of @repjohnlewis a champion of the civil rights movement. I had the great honor of working with him & was moved by his passion. His legacy will live on as we continue to grapple with our country’s painful history of racism.

When I voted to support #CARESact it was to provide immediate & much needed assistance to our community. I am glad to see that $10M of that funding is going towards assisting homeowners & renters who are behind on their payments in @MCOhio. Read more: https://t.co/4qsayUvhdL

My full statement supporting the UK’s decision to prevent the inclusion of new Huawei equipment in the UK 5G network and the goal of removing all Huawei equipment from the network by 2027: https://t.co/zuZzgn0pfv

PVS Plastics is an important contributor to combatting #COVID19. I am grateful for PVS & its employees who continue develop ventilator technology & other important medical equipment. Read more via @daytondailynews: https://t.co/gJHeZ33I2H
Read more here: https://t.co/s6rvUjaBQo

I am pleased to announce that from my request to @HouseAppropsGOP & @AppropsDems I have been able to secure an additional $11.3M in direct funding for @WrightPattAFB in FY21. This brings the total $ coming to WPAFB in the next fiscal year as a result of my work to nearly $70M.

.@EsperDoD just testified to me & HASC that he had “not received a briefing that included the word ‘bounty’” & that if there was “a credible corroborated report that used those words certainly it would have been brought to [his] attention by the chain of command...for action.” https://t.co/B9yFP173lS
LIVE: I'm questioning @EsperDoD & @thejointstaff Chairman Milley at a #HASC hearing. Watch here: https://t.co/1rIVcTkJFy

I am proud to announce I secured $58.5M in funding for construction projects @ @WrightPattAFB in #FY21NDAA. Between these projects & the $182M expansion @ NASIC I secured WPAFB has gained $240M+ from my direct advocacy & work on HASC in the past 3 years. https://t.co/W1CDC1nK0h
I'm joining @HASCRepublicans & @HASCDemocrats now to mark up #FY21NDAA to support our troops and ensure our national security. You can follow along live here: https://t.co/jmvF2k9fqi
Read my op-ed in @DailySignal about why cutting defense spending as a response to #COVID19 is neither a safe nor suitable solution: https://t.co/39Pg8H5XGc
I'm joining @gmfus #BrusselsForum now to discuss trust and resilience in times of crisis. Tune in here: https://t.co/WFLD36QWZB

I am proud to support this legislation and will be pushing for its inclusion in #NDAA. This bill will lessen Europe’s reliance on Russia and provides necessary additional scrutiny to underscore the importance of Europe’s need for alternate sources of energy. https://t.co/V4PkUCNyhr

I’m proud to introduce this amendment so active duty military personnel serving abroad have their ballot shipped with Express Mail Labels. The people protecting American democracy should have the full ability to participate in it. https://t.co/oW7YNmrnum
Today @RepSusanDavis & I introduced the Military Justice Oversight & Refinement Act of 2020 to prevent sexual assault in the military. Read more here: https://t.co/3ZD9IGAumY
To read more about @FCC's Ligado decision and my concerns as well as @JimInhofe's and 13 other federal agencies click here: https://t.co/FrUCbQHjqb

I was concerned when I asked @FCC officials if they had convinced any other agency this was good policy or if they had made an attempt to receive a classified briefing on the effects of their decision & their answer was no.
I am disappointed by the @FCC's Ligado decision. The FCC is the only federal government entity that thinks this is a good idea.
Remembering the heroes who made the ultimate sacrifice for our country and freedom #MemorialDay https://t.co/yl3NsKxzOo

.@POTUS has again rightly withdrawn from another treaty that Russia continues to violate. For several years I have supported U.S. withdrawal from the Open Skies Treaty. Read my full statement here: https://t.co/wG3dKpIdFd
Even though we are not currently able to offer in-person Capitol tours you can still have a United States Capitol Tour experience. Click here to take a virtual tour: https://t.co/fPWPR4XiRT
I will be fully supporting #OH10’s bid to host the US Space Command to support a mission critical to our national security. More info here: https://t.co/aG7G1dGqa0

Today @RepTimRyan​ & I led a letter to @POTUS urging him to restore the pension plans of Delphi Salaried Retirees before any further #COVID19 relief for the auto industry is distributed. Read more here: https://t.co/jtrt8qXELY

The economic impact of the #COVID19 pandemic on 1890s such as @CentralState87 has been devastating. I look forward to @SecretarySonny & @USDA working to provide funding to these critical universities as quickly as possible. https://t.co/FOVPayvH7E
Awesome flyby by @180thFW over Dayton today. Thank you to everyone fighting #COVID19 on the frontlines #SaluteOhio https://t.co/Dw5B4oJkhp

I joined @RepBobGibbs @RepMarcyKaptur & 86 of our colleagues in supporting future federal legislation addressing #COVID19 to forgive Medicare accelerated payments’ interest rates & pursue full loan forgiveness for hospitals & other providers. Read more: https://t.co/VWVSGQVEYf

This week I am introducing the Employer & Employee #COVID Protection Act to eliminate barriers to reopening businesses get Americans back to work & empower employees to decide for themselves if they feel safe in their workplace. Read more here: https://t.co/82qdYREf86
A beautiful rainbow in Dayton tonight. Hoping everyone is staying safe in #OH10 https://t.co/FHkOEvnpHP

The grants provided to @GDRTA will allow our community to stay connected to these essential services & help local transit get through the economic impact of the coronavirus pandemic. I will continue to support funding for our necessary local infrastructure.

.@GDRTA is set to receive $75M from @FTA_DOT as a result of #CARESact which I supported. RTA provides access to essential services such as grocery stores healthcare facilities & other businesses critical to daily life.
She was a blessing to our community and leaves behind a legacy of greatness.

I am saddened to hear of the passing of a Dayton icon & one of my dear friends Zoe Dell Nutter. She was a dancer philanthropist educator & above all a pioneer for women in aviation. Few people approach life with the passion and energy that Zoe Dell did.
.@Liz_Cheney ditto. https://t.co/yUBcP7pBUD

Don leaves behind a legacy of service and leadership and he will be sorely missed.

I join the entire Dayton community in mourning Don Black. I was proud to honor Don with the first annual Black History Month Congressional Award for Community Service in 2016. Dayton Weekly News was a cornerstone of information for Dayton’s African American community.
